abstract.p: HMS Partners is acquiring Hallmark/Tassone for stock; will merge agency into its HMS Partners advertising agency; names Bill Binstock president at HMS Partners and chief executive at merged agency, to be called HMS Hallmark (S)

block.p: HMS Partners in Columbus, Ohio, is acquiring Hallmark/Tassone, an agency with offices in Pittsburgh; Orlando, Fla.; and Tampa, Fla. Financial terms of the deal, made for stock, were not disclosed.

Hallmark/Tassone has 100 employees and billings estimated at $100 million from clients like GTE, Hoover and Universal Studios. Hallmark/Tassone will be merged into the advertising agency owned by HMS, also called HMS Partners, which has 150 employees and billings estimated at $150 million from clients like Sony Online and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
